name: Wheat
description: A grain crop. The foundation of agriculture.

name: Corn
description: A staple crop. Provides food and materials.

name: Rice
description: A grain crop grown in water. A major food source.

name: Barley
description: A grain used for food and brewing.

name: Potato
description: A root vegetable. A reliable food source.

name: Carrot
description: A root vegetable rich in nutrients.

name: Cotton
description: A plant that produces soft fibers. Used for textiles.

name: Flax
description: A plant that produces strong fibers. Used for linen.

name: Sheep
description: A domesticated animal. Provides wool and meat.

name: Cow
description: A domesticated animal. Provides milk

name: Pig
description: A domesticated animal. Provides meat.

name: Chicken
description: A domesticated bird. Provides eggs and meat.

name: Goat
description: A domesticated animal. Provides milk and meat.

name: Donkey
description: A domesticated animal. Used for transportation.

name: Pottery
description: A container made from fired clay. Used for storage.

name: Ceramic Bowl
description: A bowl made from fired clay.

name: Ceramic Pot
description: A pot made from fired clay. Used for cooking.

name: Ceramic Vase
description: A decorative container made from fired clay.

name: Brick
description: A building block made by firing clay.

name: Tile
description: A flat piece of fired clay. Used for roofing.

name: Plow
description: A tool for tilling soil. Revolutionizes agriculture.

name: Hoe
description: A tool for breaking up soil and removing weeds.

name: Sickle
description: A curved blade for harvesting crops.

name: Winnowing Basket
description: A basket for separating grain from chaff.

name: Quern Stone
description: A stone tool for grinding grain into flour.

name: Flour
description: Ground grain. Used for making bread.

name: Bread
description: A staple food made from flour and water.

name: Cheese
description: A dairy product made from milk.

name: Yogurt
description: A fermented dairy product.

name: Butter
description: A dairy product made from cream.

name: Wool
description: Soft fiber from sheep. Used for textiles.

name: Linen
description: Strong fabric made from flax fibers.

name: Cotton Cloth
description: Soft fabric made from cotton.

name: Leather
description: Processed animal hide. Used for clothing and tools.

name: Rope
description: A strong cord made from plant fibers.

name: Net
description: A mesh made from rope. Used for fishing.

name: Fishing Hook
description: A hook for catching fish.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A tool for fishing.

name: Weaving Loom
description: A device for weaving fabric from threads.

name: Spindle
description: A tool for spinning fibers into thread.

name: Spinning Wheel
description: A device for spinning fibers more efficiently.

name: Needle
description: A tool for sewing. Made from bone or metal.

name: Thread
description: A thin cord used for sewing.

name: Embroidery
description: Decorative stitching on fabric.

name: Pottery Wheel
description: A device for shaping clay into pottery.

name: Kiln
description: A furnace for firing pottery and bricks.

name: Irrigation Canal
description: A channel for bringing water to fields.

name: Water Wheel
description: A device that uses flowing water for power.

name: Millstone
description: A large stone for grinding grain.

name: Grain Silo
description: A storage structure for grain.
